title: Border, 1815–25
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Catharine Oglesby
description: Two borders printed side by side on the length of paper. Central motif is a mirror image of a modified scissors scroll decorated with elements derived from pineapple, bay, and palm leaf. This motif is enclosed by black lines ending in Greek key patterns. Above is a string of beads, below, a band of grape leaves. Yellow and black on chocolate ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1815–25.
1815–25. Block-printed on handmade paper. Museum purchase through gift of Catharine Oglesby. 1958-78-2.
